remarks: A lattice translation is not the identity iff its trace is an atom. TODO:  Can proofs be reorganized so this goes with ~ trlnidat ?  Why do both this and ~ ltrnideq need ~ trlnidat ?  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2013.)
statement:
trlnidatb.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
trlnidatb.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trlnidatb.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlnidatb.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlnidatb.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlnidatb $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( F =/= ( _I |` B ) <-> ( R ` F ) e. A ) ) $.
